description.value: Mythic power grants you speed to rival beasts and demigods. Spend a Mythic Point; for the next minute, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to all your Speeds and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Quickened]. You can use the extra action each round to Stride, Step, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Leap].
